# datapower_jsonsettings (Data Source)

JSON settings

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datapower_jsonsettings" "test" {
  depends_on = [datapower_jsonsettings.test]
  app_domain = "acc_test_domain"
}
```

Optional:
